reviews:

"No Church in the Wild"

I've never been to a place like this. It's a church build on a peninsula and the view is gorgeous! Mountains covered with...
This was one of the most beautiful places I have ever been. The paths and facilities were well maintained. The views were breathtaking. I must have taken a...
This place is so gorgeous! We came here to take some wedding photos. Our photographer friends found it the day before after asking some locals for good...

name: Juneau Limousine Services
reviews: Our family of 12 had a wonderful experience with Juneau limousine service!!!  Our tour guide/driver Brenda met us at the dock when we got off of our cruise...
Was given a city tour by Judy when our cruise ship had stopped in Juneau. She did an awesome job by taking us to all the places of interest and explaining...
Hired their services for my daughters 18th birthday. They went above and beyond. Thank you Jeff!

name: Alaska Humpback Adventures
reviews: Amazing experience. Booked this on a recent Alaskan cruise as we had heard great things about Captain Steve. The experience was much more personal than the...
Captain Steve's tours are fun, informative, and intimate. Are you excited about seeing whales? Captain Steve is too, even though he does this all of the...
As a Juneau local I've joined family visiting on a couple whale watching tours before, but our tour with Captain Steve was by far the best. The tour was...

name: Douglas Island Zipline Tour
reviews: Took my entire family on the zipline tour during our port stay in Juneau.  The two guides (Caroline and Mickey) were great with my kids.  We took a boat...

name: Alaska Tales
reviews: Capt. Rich- Sarah - Hannah were amazing - we had such a great day - the boat was wonderful with three viewing areas - and the inside was comfortable and...
Went on a Mendenhall Glacier and Whale watching excursion June 2019.  Booked directly with the company instead of through the cruise ship to save money. The...
Great tour. Katie, Lauren and Regina were awesome tour guides. The tour was intimate without having too many people on board. I would highly recommend.

name: Perseverance Trail
reviews: One of the best things about Juneau is the hiking trails! Since I haven't encountered any bears, I am still here to tell you get out there and just...

I can't believe that people once drove cars up here.

If you are visiting Juneau, this is an alternative hike to climbing Mount Roberts. There is less...
I do not usually review hiking trails, but this one was spectacular.  The view changes often and every new vista is breathtaking.  There are probably close...

name: Alaska Fish & Chips Company
reviews:
Went here the other day and tried a new menu item the bartender Roy suggested. The Hangover Fries are excellent! 10/10 recommend!
And get the Ray of...

Is this place a tourist trap: definitely.

Is it one of the 'good ones': definitely.

They've got dockside fried seafood.  If that's what you're into,...
Halibut fish and chips, best i ever had.  Place is busy but service was good.  And location is great. Food was fresh and tasted great. If i am ever back in...

name: Alaska State Capitol
reviews: Juneau state capital is the smallest capital building I have been to. Their state senate is only a few seat. The speaker chamber is small but effective. The...
Glad that my family left the big tourist part of Juneau to come see the state capitol building. It literally is just an office building but inside there is...

name: Juneau Adventures
reviews: We had a great experience with Captain Terry on our day out fishing. He was very helpful and had a lot of patience with our two boys who loves to fish....

name: Glacier Cinemas
reviews: It's not bad but the seats in the smaller theatres could be better- it's like sitting in lawn chairs. Movie was a little loud the last time, but the popcorn...
They try old theaters uncomfortable seats but otherwise just a place to watch a movie
Small but nice. Out crew saw deadpool here on a day off at the beginning of the summer. Would definitely go back

name: Juneau Pedicab

name: The Port
reviews: Kombucha on tap!! Thank you very much!! Delicious!! I had elderflower rooibos; they ran out of roasted dandelion ginger. Only two flavors on tap, but that's...

name: Capital Cab
reviews: This is the way to go if you are in port on and ship. Was on a NCL ship that had bus's taking us all into town. The wait was over an hour to go just a few...

Worst experience ever.  No sense of urgency or of timing.  Texted to cancel us immediately after booking.  Call glacier taxi and tours instead.

name: Alaskan Hotel & Bar
reviews:
This review is only for the bar.

Great bar with a good vibe right in downtown Juneau! Beautiful old building, live music and an awesome bartender. They...

name: Dimond Park Aquatic Center
reviews: Great place to be on a cold and rainy day in Juneau! $8 for a visitor day pass is pretty reasonable.  They have lap pool, large kiddie pool with playground...

This is my first time here at the diamond aquatic center. Came in with my son and daughter-in-law and my almost one year old grandson. 
What a great family...

Kids are loving it!
Also they have snacks and drinks as well as waiting chairs. Area was clean and well kept.

name: Alaska Seaplanes
reviews: My partner and I ended up getting stuck in Fraser BC behind an avalanche and missed our barge, got close to missing our flight. When we arrived in skagway...

Great trip

name: Chum Fun Charters

name: Tracy's King Crab Shack
reviews:
The food here was amazing!

The crab was delicious no pic posted of crab cause I ate it so fast.

The shrimp was good and I love the sauce it came in.

This...

name: Patsy Ann

name: The Narrows Bar
reviews:
Now this is what a bar is supposed to be like. Cozy and full of people. It's beautiful inside and they can make anything you want. The music is good
and the...
Fun hipster place in Juneau.  Who'd a thunk it.  Their craft cocktails are crazy and became a regular haunt. Nice place that has the occasional band...
Not only the best cocktails in Alaska but some of the best I have ever had.  Also great, friendly service.

The jewelry...

reviews:

name: Stone Cut Bodies
reviews: Erika is a great trainer. Her sessions are exhausting and get results. I like that she doesn't rely on fancy equipment or the same exercises over and over...
I've been working out with Erika for a couple of years now. I get bored easily and Erika is great at designing a work out that not only best fits your needs...
I found Erika from Thumbtack's site. I was happy to find someone within my budget and helping me starting a new leaf toward better health. Her recommended...

name: Twin Lakes
reviews: Great place for a walk or just to watch your kids play. Enjoy the beautiful view of the main channel and the ponds filled with waterfowl. Nicely trimmed...
There's a playground for kids, a trail with wheel chair friendly access as a paved trail, close by the road so you still hear traffic noise nearby.  Wear...

name: Juneau Mercantile & Armory
reviews: Came here in late September during an Alaska cruise. Our glacier helicopter excursion was cancelled due to bad weather, so we hit the shooting range...
Friendly staff, cool taxidermy on the walls. They make you watch a safety video before shooting (which even shows a lot of girls shooting- yes) and provide...
The staff is very helpful and the place is empty. The prices are high but if you want to talk shop it's definitely the place to go. If you are wanting to...

name: Observatory
reviews: Great bookstore! Especially if you are looking for books pertaining to Alaska or you collect maps. They even have first editions of Muir. The lady is very...

name: Savikko Park
reviews: A perfect place for a bonfire or renting a picnic shelter for your picnic. Seems that a lot of people use this beach for swimming compared to Lena or Auke...
Savikko Park (Sandy Beach) is a place where you may reserve one of the two shelters, number two shelter being the larger of the two with a fireplace....

name: Skagway Tours
reviews: This whale watching tour far exceeded our expectations!  Two young men, Mark and Lucas, lead the tour.  First impressions are deceiving.  These were not...

name: Juneau Artists Gallery
reviews: A coop style gallery with excellent choices of handmade art goods.  Paintings, pottery, jewelry, wall art and unique goods to enjoy viewing.  Staff/artists...
Juneau Artists Gallery is full of all art mediums made by local artists.  Check it out even if you don't have any plans on buying something.  You may be...
What a great place to see local artist's work and learn about the local artists, as well. This is an artist's gallery, which means local artist display...

name: Lucky Lady Pub
reviews: The Lucky Lady Pub is quite fun. The bartender is super friendly. It's like one of those places where everyone is happy and having a good time. It seems...

Whale Oil Beef Frank*.... this is best dive bar in all of Alaska!!!
(not that I've been to nearly all of them, or even remotely close, but I bet I'm...
My two favortie watering holes are good dive bars and good Irish pubs... Lucky Lady was both.  Mostly locals in here when we came, which I appreciated....

name: Big Jim's Charters

name: Whale Watch & Wildlife Tours
reviews: Great tour.  Saw too many whales to count.  Sometimes four at a time.  Crew was very respectful to wildlife and whales.  Very knowledgeable staff.  This is...

name: Alaska Governor's Mansion
reviews: I was here for a reception and it was very nice.  There are a lot of historic pieces on display.  There is an entry area with a coat check which is...
Cool history about Alaska and Russia. It was an interesting tour and we learned a lot about the history of the mansion, as well as Alaska and Juneau.

I swear - it's just a coincidence that I'm writing this review on Election Day 2008.  

In early August, a few weeks before the vice presidential picks were...

name: Goals Gym
reviews: Visiting from out of town and found this gym... There are daily rates for shorter stays and weekly and monthly for longer ones. The front door was locked...
The gym is very intimate and there is rarely more than 5 people in the gym at a time. The location is very small and equipment are stacked on top of each...

name: Salmon Creek
reviews: Hike goes from easy to difficult very quickly. The last 30-40 minutes is just straight incline with mostly rocks and a not very well maintained and marked...
Trail entrance is by electric transmission lines parking lot.  Fairly steep initial hike for about the first twenty minutes, then more gradual for a long...

name: BestDamnCharters
reviews: I found these guys via an internet search and took a leap of faith. I liked their reviews and their name, and figured they had a sense of humor. Best...
These guys are fantastic. We brought in three gorgeous halibut and several lovely salmon. Such nice people!  The boat is perfect.
The best experience I have had. From the ease of arranging everything to the way they treat you like royalty. They made the most memorable experience for my...

name: Saffron

I've waited a couple days to decide how to word this review. I visit Juneau quite a lot, but never am here in a timeframe when this place is open. I was so...

Small menu, tasty Indian food at reasonable prices, slow delivery. 

Lunch here today. My wife and I split a spinach chicken curry and our friends split a...

name: Juneau City Of Borough
reviews: Juneau - an animal house kind of town. I talked to people from the west side of Chicago that say walking around in Chicago makes them feel safer than...

reviews: It's a quarterly scheduled evening event on the second floor by various artists providing entertainment, with an option for drinks, food provided by...

name: Triangle Club
reviews:
Toby Keith said it best, "I Love This Bar"

The Triangle was a welcome respite from those waterfront establishments catering to the stampede of clamoring...
I started my two week Alaska adventures with a three night stay in Juneau. The day before flying to Anchorage we decided to spend our Friday evening...
